Reviews.Content: Lots of minimalism.....even the service The moment we arrived, and we saw the duplex suite with kitchenette, sofa, cd player, tv , nespresso machine, free wifi and all the minimalist designer lighting, we were impressed. this soon changed though....The kitchenette was devoid of any cutlery, plates, or utensils. Apparently you have to order it from the front desk. Cheap? Just a little. The Nespresso machine was compemented with 2 capsules of coffee. Want more? Order them from reception at 50 cents a pop (normally they cost 30 cents). Make an extra 20 cents by reselling nespresso capsules..cheap? Just a little. Heating: Two settings: Freeze or fry. Cheap? Just a little. Room service on Sunday: Restaurant closed and there is no other way to offer guests something to eat. Called reception and I got a pizza deliver number...cheap? VERY.QGat: Get your act together. Guests will not come back just for the designer lighting.
Reviews.Author: TerryBarcelona
